SEARCH
Package project.education.service

Class StudentService

java.lang.Object
project.education.service.StudentService
@Service public class StudentService extends Object
Service for managing Student entities. Provides business logic for handling students and their enrollment in courses.

      Returns:
      a list of courses the student is not yet enrolled in
